release.module-fancy: A set of VA-API based elements for GStreamer

intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce the first bugfix release in the stable 1.12 release series of your favourite cross-platform multimedia framework!
This release only contains bugfixes and it is safe to update from 1.12.x. For a full list of bugfixes see Bugzilla.
See &site;/releases/1.12/ for the full release notes.

bug.summary: vaapiwindow_x11: invalid src rect info when using vpp in vaapiwindow.
